original: @30a / /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @30a / /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: na mo ratna shi khi ne /
analyzed: na mo ratna shi khi ne /

original: aarha te samyaksam bud dh'a ya /
analyzed: aarha te samyaksam bud dh'a ya /

original: tadya th'a / ratne ratne ratne shi khi ne sv'ah'a /
analyzed: tadya th'a / ratne ratne ratne shi khi ne sv'ah'a /
translated: Tadyatha ratne ratne ratna shikhinaye svaha.

original: 'chi ba'i che dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i che dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur /
translated: If one remembers this at the time of death, one will be completely liberated from all lower realms.

original: 'chi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skye'o //
analyzed: 'chi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skye'o //
translated: After death, one will be reborn as a god in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so //
translated: The recollection of the name of the Buddha Ratnashikhin is complete.
